Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 35 mins
features: 【HD Webcam 1080P with Microphone】 LarmTek 1080P web camera with FULL HD glass lens delivers a high-quality video at a fluid 30 frames every sec.The built-in microphon’s noise suppression filters out unnecessary background noise providing crisp clear audio.

【110 degree Wide Angle Webcam】 The laptop webcam can capture full HD video in a wide viewing angle range of up to 110 degrees. When you are streaming in real time, video chatting or recording, it provides you with an unparalleled perspective.

【Plug and Play USB Camera】 HD webcam is very easy to use. The USB connector allows an easy set up. NO additional driver required. More Importantly, our desktop PC cameras feature a Tripod-ready Rotatable Clip（Tripod not included), Adjustable universal clip that fits your multi-angle needs on computers, laptops, desktops, Mac, PC, Smart TV, LCD monitors and other flat surfaces.

【Advanced Technology and Streaming Webcam】 PC camera with automatic light correction and HDR technology the computer webcam can automatically adjust color and brightness to achieve natural lighting. Even in dim light this technology helps to provide the best possible image. This pro streaming camera provides excellent quality video on Skype, Facetime, OBS, XBOX ONE, Hangouts, Facebook, Zoom, Twitch and more.
【After Sales Service】 This HD webcam will make you more beautiful in the video. If you have any questions, we will take care of you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Automatic Low Light Correction 1080P webcam with automatic low light correction technology make stream clear video even in dim light. so you always look best yourself on camera. Make You More Confident 1080p HD webcam has High resolution sensor and glass lens,which displays you more beautiful on the video. So you will be more confident when making video calls with others. Protect Your Privacy From Internet Hackers Covering your webcam is essential to stay protected! This handy webcam cover fits over your webcam when not in use, preventing webcam hackers from spying.

How To Install The Webcam Privacy Shutter？ 1.Clean the surface of the web cam. 2. Tear off the 3M tape on the back of the cover. 3. Stick the cover to the usb webcam according to the lens position. 4. Then you can freely open and close the cover. Two Placement Pethods With mounting clip and ¼ tripod thread, the USB webcam is suitable for almost any surface, monitor, TV, desktop High-Def Video Calling 1080p webcam provides high quality video, so that your video calls with your family and friends are as real as sitting face to face, and can provide you with a good visual experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super clear video
reviews.reviewText: Very impressive camera and a low price. Plug and play made it super easy to install and use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great webcam at a great value!
reviews.reviewText: I have used this webcam for a number of meetings and it works great. The image quality is better than expected and very good if you have adequate lighting. The built-in microphone is ok and gets the job done well. The included tripod is a little stiff at first but works great after playing with it a bit. The included privacy shutter works great. It comes separate so you can choose to use it or not. It is easy to attach but does slightly block the power and signal LEDs but it's not an issue.Overall I think it's a great webcam and you can't go wrong with the price. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's a Webcam that works well enough to get me through online University classes. Past that.... eh?Microphone feature? Don't even try it and make sure you disable it in your sound settings lmao

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Budget Friendly Camera
reviews.reviewText: Easy set up. The picture quality is excellent especially for such a budget friendly camera. Very happy with the purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great webcam for the price.
reviews.reviewText: The only thing I didn't like about this product is the widescreen lens. It's probably not going to be a problem for anyone, but I bought it for the purpose of tabletop gaming through services such as playEDH and I'm not the biggest fan of the wide angle lens. It can make the field look weird and make it a little hard to follow what's going on for the other people playing, but that's more of a nitpick than anything else.It's a great deal for the price, and if you're also looking to buy a webcam for some webcam tabletop gaming or something similar, you can't go wrong with the price. I would also recommend, if you're going to get this for that specific purpose, get a stand for it because the stand that comes with it is not very good for tabletop gaming.Again, all just nitpicks, it's a very nice webcam for the price. Audio quality on the mic is great, picture looks great, it's definitely worth picking up if you need one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The Microphone does not work
reviews.reviewText: Purchased 6 of these a year ago and the Microphones on all of them do not work. Regardless of which Windows 10 or 11 machine.The T/S in the manual does not work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for...
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the most inexpensive webcams, and one of a very few with relatively narrow angle field of view of 75 degrees. Most other options cost 2-3x more and have a ridiculously wide angle of 110 degrees, which means the world sees your whole room. This makes no sense when 99% of us are just one person on camera for work/school, not a huge conference room, warehouse surveillance, or YouTuber showing off their studio (and those latter "pro" users would spring for a better cam anyway).BUT... but compared to 2 other webcams we got, the image quality on this one is pretty bad. Specifically, there are 3 problems: (1) lots of grainy noise even with reasonable light; (2) the image is a little blurry regardless of the resolution, it's the lens that matters, not the megapixels, and (3) the image is badly distorted on the sides so that a door frame looks bowed. Judging by other reviews, most people don't care or don't know the difference, and just want something that works.For just a little more, there are many other choices in the $45-75 range that are noticeably better quality, with none of the above problems. Unless you're a pro, you don't need to spend more than that. We are on camera all day long during the pandemic, so we wanted an alternative that wasn't distractingly bad.If you like a very narrow angle, more like a real camera or human vision field of view, check out the Looca "Webcam 4K HD Computer Camera - 8MP Microphone PC Web Camera, Full Widescreen Laptop USB Webcams with Privacy Shutter and Tripod, for Mac Desktop Notebook Video Calling Recording Webcam" https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08B4X2BRL/ref=cm_sw_em_r_mt_dp_epeLFb9PKPZDV

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice camera for the money
reviews.reviewText: This camera was immediately recognized by Windows 10 which made it simple to install. I am testing it on my Asus Laptop as well as a Dell Desktop. Both recognized it immediately. I am a media director and use various broadcast programs but thought I would test it with programs that regular people might use. I used Zoom and OBS to test both image and audio. It functioned perfectly with both programs. The mic audio was clear and clean. The image was so much better than the onboard camera on my laptop and was a nice clear HD image. I was even able to use the virtual background feature in zoom. It functioned as I would expect a webcam should and at a reasonable price. I am extremely pleased with this camera.

no voy a mentir, la calidad de la imagen es bastante decente. DECENTE, NO BUENA, solo DECENTE.pero se hecho a perder en menos de 2 meses. ahora parece que traigo filtro de instagram o de gameboy camera. no se que diablos le pasó. menos mal la compre en descuento. NO LA RECOMIENDO. busca una marca que tenga garantía.

reviews.reviewTitle: You get what you pay for!
reviews.reviewText: Worked for one week, and then the video portion stopped working. Quality reflects price unfortunately!
